sentences.en: A rock - music cult called " Woodstock Nation " flared briefly, then burned out.
sentences.cn: 一阵被称为 “ 伍德斯托克民族 ” 的摇滚乐狂潮,如昙花一现, 随后成了过眼烟云.

sentences.en: Her books aren't bestsellers, but they have a certain cult following.
sentences.cn: 她的书算不上畅销书，但有一定的崇拜者。

sentences.en: In his youth he had been sucked into a hippy cult.
sentences.cn: 他年轻的时候一度过着嬉皮士式的生活.

sentences.en: James Dean was a cult hero of the fifties.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯·迪安在20世纪50年代备受推崇.

sentences.en: Ludlam was responsible for making Ridiculous Theatre something of a cult.
sentences.cn: 荒诞派戏剧的风靡要归功于勒德拉姆。

sentences.en: Meanwhile the personality cult around this campaigner grew.
sentences.cn: 同时，对这位竞选者的个人崇拜正在逐渐升温。

sentences.en: O’Brien has a cult of devoted readers.
sentences.cn: 奥布赖恩有一批忠实的读者。

sentences.en: Sandman is a cult figure on the local music scene.
sentences.cn: 桑德曼是当地音乐界的偶像人物。

sentences.en: Since her death, she has become a cult figure.
sentences.cn: 她死后成了部分人狂热崇拜的偶像。

sentences.en: That rock musician has a cult following.
sentences.cn: 那个摇滚音乐家拥有大批狂热的崇拜者.

sentences.en: The bra has gone from being a fashion classic to a fashion cult.
sentences.cn: 胸罩已经从经典时尚转变为流行时尚。

sentences.en: The cult leader saw himself as a Messianic figure.
sentences.cn: 这个异教团体的领袖把自己看作救世主一般的人物。

sentences.en: The cult of Isis was carried from Egypt into Greece and Rome.
sentences.cn: 对伊希斯的膜拜从埃及传到了希腊和罗马。

sentences.en: The film is destined to become a cult classic.
sentences.cn: 这部电影注定会成为风靡一时的经典之作。

sentences.en: The modern cult of beauty is not exclusively a function of wealth.
sentences.cn: 现代对美貌的狂热崇拜并不只是财富的作用.

words.tran_cn: 祭仪（尤其指宗教上的）；礼拜；狂热信徒

trans.tran_cn: 异教团体，偶像，时尚，热潮
trans.tran_en: a group of people who are very interested in a particular thing
